Goblin UI

WidgetParents

CGOBFrameFrame is a window with a title bar.
CGOBMenuMenu is a widget that can have a background image and children.
CGOBMsgBoxMsgBox is a modal window that simply displays a text message and allows a couple buttons like Ok and Cancel.
CGOBPanelPanel is a flat window that has no title bar and can be moved by click and dragging on an empty part of the panel.
CGOBPopMenuPopMenu is a popup widget that contains children widgets.
CGOBWidgetParentWidgetParent is a parent class to children widgets.
